title: Episode 140: Liquid Matthew, Maria Del Carmen and Dorothy Jane Scott With Special Guest Christine Schiefer!
description:
That's right! We have the second half of And That's Why We Drink on as our extra special guest! It's Christine Schiefer on for a twisty true crime extravaganza. Tonight we talk true crime, severed heads in boxes, soupy mistakes and Ash tells us whether or not we are truly "wildin'". Come on in for some twisty, true crime madness.

Thanks to our sponsor!

Better Help
